Enzyme: composed of glucose transport via diffusion (extracellular to periplasm) and D-glucoseMaltotriose transport via diffusion (extracellular to periplasm) irreversible and D-glucose transport via PEP:Pyr PTS (periplasm)
Gene name: (malX and ptsH and crr and ptsI) or (ptsG and ptsI and ptsH and crr) or (manZ and ptsH and manY and manX and ptsI) or lamB or phoE or ompF or ompN or ompC
